summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1579, for the improvement of 36th Avenue North, form the south line of Coulter's Addition to East Thomas Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 16854 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
